name: BATMAN
text: You wanted me. Here I am.

name: JOKER
text: I wanted to see what you'd do...and you didn't disappoint. You let 5 people die. Then you let Dent take your place. Even to a guy like me, that's cold.

name: BATMAN
text: Where's Dent?

name: JOKER
text: Those mob fools want you dead so they can get back to the way things were. But I know the truth: there's no going back. You've changed things. Forever.

name: BATMAN
text: Then why do you want to kill me?

name: JOKER
text: Kill you? I don't wanna kill you. What would I do without you? Go back to ripping off mob dealers? No. No. No! No you- you complete me.

name: BATMAN
text: You're garbage who kills for money.

name: JOKER
text: Don't talk like one of them, you're not. Even if you'd like to be. To them, you're a freak. Like me. They just need you right now.

name: JOKER
text: But as soon as they don't they'll cast you out. Like a leper.

name: JOKER
text: Their morals, their code; it's a bad joke. Dropped at the first sign of trouble. They're only as good as the world allows them to be. You'll see- I'll show you. When the chips are down these, uh, civilized people? They'll eat each other. See I'm not a monster, I'm just ahead of the curve.

name: BATMAN
text: Where's Dent?

name: JOKER
text: You have these rules, and you think they'll save you.

name: BATMAN
text: I have one rule.

name: JOKER
text: Then that's the one rule you'll have to break to know the truth.

name: BATMAN
text: Which is?

name: JOKER
text: The only sensible way to live in this world is without rules. And tonight you're gonna break your one rule.

name: BATMAN
text: I'm considering it.

name: JOKER
text: There are just minutes left so you're gonna have to play my little game if you want to save......one of them.

name: BATMAN
text: Them?

name: JOKER
text: For a while I thought you really were Dent. The way you threw yourself after her...

name: JOKER
text: Look at you go! Does Harvey know about you and his little bunny?

name: BATMAN
text: WHERE ARE THEY?

name: JOKER
text: Killing is making a choice!

name: BATMAN
text: WHERE ARE THEY?

name: JOKER
text: You choose one life over the other. Your friend, the district attorney, or his blushing bride-to-be.

name: JOKER
text: You have nothing! Nothing to threaten me with! Nothing to do with all your strength. But don't worry. I'm going to tell you where they are. Both of them. And that's the point. You'll have to choose.

name: JOKER
text: He's at 250 52nd Street. And she's at Avenue X at Cicero.
